I hate the app because of their unintelligent gift card system.  I heard they used to have it where you can combine multiple gift cards to pay for your order. Now I have 5 gift cards on my account with not enough to pay for an order on a card and no way to add more.  I cannot recharge the cards like Starbucks or have a combined bank like Chick Fil A.  They know of the problem and do not care.  I just want to use gift cards and Sonic makes it hard.

The app is ok for placing orders especially if you are like me and donâ€™t want to wait, however, if some of your items are not available, then good luck with getting a refund for what you donâ€™t get. I ordered a milkshake with a few other items, the milkshake machine was down, so they offered to give me something else or give me a refund. I took the refund, which I was expecting to be put back on my card. After a week and there was no refund, I reached out to the support team thru the app only to be told there was no record of the refund. They advised me to wait a few more days and if no refund reach out to the store manager. So today I went to the store and the manager advised me that unless the entire order was refunded, they would have given me cash, they have no way of
Refunding a partial order if you order thru the app, the can only refund cash at the store. I never got the cash and a refund was never put back on my card.  The store manager did give me the milkshake, 23 days after the order was placed. So that issue was resolved.

A note to other users, if you donâ€™t get your full order, because the milkshake machine is down, or they run out of something, you will get a cash refund unless they cancel the entire order, donâ€™t expect the refund to be put back on your card, cause itâ€™s not..
